Package alix.util

Class ChainRoller

java.lang.Object
alix.util.Roller
alix.util.ChainRoller
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Iterable<Chain>
public class ChainRoller
extends Roller
implements java.lang.Iterable<Chain>
Efficient Object to handle a sliding window of mutable String (Chain), Works like a circular array that you can roll on a token line.
